name: Kin Of Mimoza: Pizza Servers
description:
Hello again everyone!

This game, Kin of Mimoza : Pizza Servers is my submission for UGJ#53.

You'll be playing as Bertolt and Tobias, the sons of Mimoza, who was a boss in a previous game, Nordi Holder.

Controls: WASD to Move, Look at table and press E to serve.

Please feel free to leave a comment and rate the game, and have fun!
